short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Syncora FQ Assistant developed with Vite, React and Typescript

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transforming site workflows with intelligent, multi-platform technology solutions designed to simplify and streamline pre-clinical trial processes. 

Experience ease of operations with FQA feature. Simplify and expedite the feasibility questionnaire process, saving time and ensuring accuracy with AI-driven suggestions based on your previous entries and therapeutic areas. 

Key Benefits: 

1. Effortless Auto-Fill Feasibility Questionnaires: Our AI-driven FQA feature intelligently suggests answers based on your past responses and specific therapeutic areas, allowing you to complete feasibility questionnaires with unprecedented ease.  

2. Streamlined Workflow Management: Manage and track your pre-clinical trial tasks from a single, secure platform. Our extension supports multi-platform functionality, ensuring you have access to all your essential tools wherever you are.  

3. Enhanced Data Accuracy: Reduce errors and maintain consistent data management with our advanced suggestion algorithms, designed to enhance the reliability of your trial documentation.  

4. Secure and Efficient: Benefit from two-factor authentication and robust privacy measures, ensuring your data remains protected and confidential.
